title: [Large-Scale] Workshop on Knowledge Graph-Based STEAM Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in single-subject curriculum design, basic STEAM education concepts, and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers collaborate without spatiotemporal constraints using mobile devices, strengthening interdisciplinary STEAM topic development capabilities centered on social studies.

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can design STEAM project topics linked to social studies using knowledge graph analysis tools.
100% of participating teachers can develop three or more interdisciplinary integrated activities by applying a project-based learning (PBL) design framework.
90% of learners can submit project plans, including assessment rubrics, based on the generated knowledge graph.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
